title: Default value lost in list box of report parameter after modifying it
description:
Description: The default value set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying it.

Steps to reproduce:
1. [Step 1 description here]
OB: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying it.
EB:
Change the display type to a Combo Box.
Expected result: The default value should be 'aaa'. After completing step 5, the OK button should be grayed out.

Actual result: No default value is set. After completing step 5, the OK button is still enabled.
SR:

2. [Step 2 description here]
